Validate GTAP Files for Extraction

Source: R/GTAPauto.R
dot-validate_extract_files.Rd

Validates input files, mapping configurations, and case names for GTAP data extraction.

Usage

.validate_extract_files(sl4map, harmap, input.folder, case.name, info.mode)

Arguments

sl4map

Data frame, NULL, or FALSE. Mapping for SL4 variables.

harmap

Data frame, NULL, or FALSE. Mapping for HAR variables.

input.folder

Character. Path to folder containing GTAP input files.

case.name

Character vector. Case names (experiment names) to validate.

info.mode

Character. Mapping mode: "GTAPv7", "Yes", "No", or "Mix".

Value

A list with validation status, messages, and proceed flag.
